title: Crazy Office: Slap and Smash!
description: Crazy Office: Slap and Smash! is a slapstick beat-em-up that turns a dull office into a hilarious battlefield. Youâ€™ll throw chairs, swing golf clubs, and cause ragdoll mayhem as you fight your way past coworkers and unhinged bosses. Rise through the floors, unleash chaos, and deliver your final smackdown to the CEO in true cubicle-conquering style.
